name: GrowthList_setTest
description: Unit tests for the set method in the GrowthList class, including scenarios with and without growth.

test_cases.name: testSetWithGrowth
test_cases.description: Tests the set method of GrowthList when the list needs to grow to accommodate the specified index.

test_cases.name: testSetWithoutGrowth
test_cases.description: Tests the set method of GrowthList when the list does not need to grow.
